description: Allgon AB engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of wireless products and systems for mobile communications. The company is headquartered in Kista, Stockholm and currently employs 353 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2000-05-02. The company is engaged in the development, manufacture and marketing of antennas and antenna systems for vehicles, industry and mobile communications. The Company’s activities are focused on two business areas: Automotive and Communications. The Automotive business area supplies antennas to the automotive industry and its customer base includes Volvo Trucks, Volvo CE, Renault Trucks, UD Trucks, Scania, Volvo Cars, Audi, Bentley and Fisker. The Communications business area offers wireless solutions and applications, such as Machine to Machine (M2M) applications to vending machines, parking and ticket machines, security alarm systems and vehicle tracking, among others.
naicsNationalIndustry: Radio and Television Broadcasting and Wireless Communications Equipment Manufacturing
name: Allgon AB (publ)
